resources.string: Welcome to the Government of India
MyGov (mygov.nic.in) has been launched by the Hon\'ble Prime Minister to facilitate Citizen Engagement for Good Governance and present a wonderful opportunity to move towards Surajya.

Government: Federal republic, Constitutional republic, Parliamentary system
Capital: New Delhi
President: Pranab Mukherjee
Population: 1.237 billion (2012, Source: World Bank)
Prime minister: Narendra Modi

In the directory you will find the contact information for Union, State and UT Government agencies, authorized persons and employees. The web directory is a one-point source to access all Indian Government Websites at all levels and from all sectors.
Pressing the button below will open an online form from where you can send a message to Hon\'ble PM.

In employmentnews.gov.in you will find information regarding job vacancies, job oriented training programmes, admission notices relating to job oriented courses and result of recruitment examinations. In addition to job vacancies, Rozgar Samachar, in each issue, carries article on job opportunities in various sectors, including emerging sectors.
rti.gov.in is the official RTI site and rtionline.gov.in is a portal to file RTI applications/first appeals online along with payment gateway.

india.gov.in is the Official Portal of the Government of India, designed, developed and hosted by the National Informatics Centre (NIC), a premier ICT organization of the Government of India under the aegis of the Department of Electronics and Information Technology (DeitY), the Ministry of Communications and Information Technology.
App name: Government Of India\nCurrent version: 1.0\nDeveloper: Manojit Ghosh
Share this app on Facebook and Twitter.
